attributes.action: Immediately end all UK "Foreign Aid" and divert all resources to England
attributes.additional_details:
In view of the floods both in 2014 and 2015 in England it is obvious that the £10 Billion in Foreign Aid, needs to be spent in England, not in the Third World.

The Government, and the Government Propaganda agent the BBC, have both spent years telling us about Global Warming and Global Change but have not prepared for changes in weather patterns, the first responsibility of Government is to Protect the People.
attributes.background: Immediately end all UK "Foreign Aid" and divert all resources to England - Charity begins at home ! - In view of the floods both in 2014 and 2015 in England it is obvious that the £10 Billion in Foreign Aid, needs to be spent in England, not in the Third World
